brief: This is a simple Square Wave Oscillator.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Set the frequency of the oscillator in Hz.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of of the square oscillator.

methods.name: add()
methods.desc: Offset the output of this generator by given value.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

description: This is a simple Square Wave Oscillator.
name: SqrOsc
